page.title: 16LIVING IN THE NEWTOWN AREA
page.content: Advantages: Most people mention love of the countryside, its beauty, peace and cleanliness. The community spirit and friendliness are also important factors. Some families mention the school with its small classes and others the closeness to large towns with their amenities, the motorway, the sea and the continent. Disadvantages: The main concern was lack of amenities (entertainment,sport etc.) and the high cost involved in visiting them. Secondly the lack of mains drainage and the irony that if it was laid then the area might well be developed to an undesirable extent. The biggest single issues are lack of public transport and the lack of speed restrictions on Newtown's through road. Most people are concerned that the village life should remain unchanged.
